description: Mallow`s Brother sent Mallow the recipe to make Alola Stew while on his culinary journey. While he was traveling, he happened to come across some old writing that mentioned how to make Alola Stew. According to the recipe, the stew requires Saffron-Color Nectar to complete it as that`s the invaluable ingredient that makes the stew leave a tingling aftertaste.
name: Mao no Oniichan
